name: NthDimenzion Solutions
description:
NthDimenzion Solutions (P) Limited, headquartered in Bangalore, India, is a niche player in Business and IT Consulting Services. NthDimenzion portfolio of services include Business and IT Consulting, Application Development, Application Management, Business Intelligence and Outsourced Product Development.
We specialize in custom built frameworks to address various business processes in Healthcare, Supply Chain,Media & Entertainment and Education.
 
NthDimenzion's vision is to build innovative products and solutions to address diverse business needs and enable higher operating efficiencies and increased productivity across enterprises by leveraging cutting edge technology. NthDimenzion has been partnering with several startups to co-create products in an equity sharing model to enable faster time to market.
 
NthDimenzion's focus is on Cloud Computing, Big Data and Analytics ( predominantly open source based), Mobility Solutions and Enterprise Web Application development using Agile Delivery Methodology. NthDimenzion technical team expertise ranges across both Java and Microsoft technologies.
READ MORE...

locations.address: 847 A Block 1st Main Road 2nd Floor Sahakarnagar
